articles.author: Michael E. Miller
articles.title: Australia votes against giving Indigenous peoples a voice to parliament - The Washington Post
articles.description: The failure of the “Voice to Parliament” referendum was widely expected but nevertheless comes as a blow to Aboriginal Australians, who have been marginalized since colonization.
